description: Multi-objective optimization problems requiring system-level thinking

problems.prompt: Design a boost converter for polar seismic monitoring station. Input: 6V-12V from radioisotope thermoelectric generator, Output: 28V at 3A for communications. Must operate at -70°C ambient, survive polar bear tampering (3000N force), and run unattended for 10 years.

Design a flyback converter for electronic mining detonator system. Input: 3V from lithium primary cell, Output: 500V at 10mA for igniter charging. Must be safe (no accidental discharge), survive 10-year shelf life, and arm only with coded signal.

Design a forward converter for superconducting NMR magnet heater and sensors. Input: 48V external, Output: 24V at 10A. Must operate at 4K liquid helium temperature (electronics at room temp), minimize heat leak into cryostat, and provide ultra-stable current for shimming.

Design a SEPIC converter for avalanche rescue transceiver. Input: 3V-4.5V from 3×AAA alkaline, Output: 3.3V at 500mA peak for RF transceiver. Must operate in -40°C snow conditions, survive burial, and provide 250-hour battery life in standby with periodic transmit.

Design a half-bridge converter for electromagnetic levitation coil driver. Input: 750V DC from third rail, Output: ±300V at 200A peak for levitation magnet. Must provide 500Hz position bandwidth, handle 1g lateral accelerations, and fail gracefully with 50ms safe descent.

Design a buck converter for proton therapy gantry steering magnets. Input: 48V, Output: 10V at 400A for dipole magnet. Must achieve 1ppm current stability, support 360° gantry rotation, and allow 10ms field changes for spot scanning.

Design a flyback converter for ROV thruster motor controller. Input: 300V DC from surface, Output: 48V at 5A for brushless motor driver. Must operate at 6000m depth (600 bar), handle oil-filled pressure compensation, and survive umbilical hotplug events.

Design a full-bridge converter for particle accelerator kicker magnet pulse generator. Input: 800V DC, Output: 25kV pulse at 500A peak for 1μs. Must achieve <50ns rise time, 1Hz repetition rate, and 0.1% pulse-to-pulse amplitude repeatability.

Design a boost converter for high-altitude balloon payload. Input: 5V-8V from flexible solar array, Output: 28V at 2A for payload electronics. Must operate at 35km altitude (-60°C, 1% atmosphere), survive cosmic ray events, and handle 50% solar cell degradation.

Design a Ćuk converter for LIGO-style gravitational wave detector laser stabilization. Input: 24V, Output: -12V at 2A for photodetector bias. Must achieve <1nV/√Hz output noise, operate in ultra-high vacuum (10⁻⁹ torr), and be magnetically shielded to <1nT.
